creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Black woman at left wearing a red skirt suit with white buttons, red and white striped blouse, and red hat with white pompon or flower; Black woman to right of first figure wearing a black blouse, tan skirt, and tan hat with white bow, holding a baby wrapped in a white blanket; Black couple at right, with woman in a brown skirt suit and brown hat with white band, reaching out for baby, and man wearing a dark suite and dark hat; two Black children at center; small framed portrait of a Black man in a black hat against a turquoise ground, on a shelf at top center; received in white frame
medium: Dye on carved and tooled leather
signed: below feet of woman at right, incised: WINFrEd / 5-02 / REMbErt
title: The Beginning
